author: Kevin Mok
name: onlineping
short: Ping when tracked users come online.
description: Pings requesters in a chosen channel when specified members switch to Online. Requires Guild Presences & Guild Members intents.
install_msg: Use `[p]onlineping track @user #channel` to start. `[p]onlineping list` / `untrack` to manage.
end_user_data_statement: Stores user IDs of requesters, target member IDs, and one channel ID per guild to deliver pings. No other personal data is collected.
